summary.span: 提供一些类，使用这些类可以快速将打印系统对象的属性设置复制到同一类型的另一个对象。

span.span: Provides classes that enable rapidly copying the property settings of a print system object to another object of the same type.

summary.span: 另外，这些类还可用于循环访问打印系统对象的属性和在运行时发现其类型（无需使用反射）。

span.span: Also, enables iteration through the properties of print system objects and the discovery of their types at run time, without using reflection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间包含具有以下核心类：This namespace contains the following core classes: - 类，该类是大多数其他类的基类。The class, which is the base class for most of the other classes. - ，即其中的项类的所有实例都派生自。The , which is a whose entries are all instances of classes derived from . 此命名空间使能够在运行时，发现而无需使用反射，打印系统对象的属性的类型，如， ，或。This namespace makes it possible to discover at run time, without using reflection, the types of the properties of print system objects, such as , , or . 有关此命名空间中显示的类使用的示例，请参阅， ，和。For examples that show the use of the classes in this namespace, see , , and . 此命名空间是提供 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 的增强打印服务的一部分。This namespace is part of the enhanced printing services provided with Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF). 使用 Windows 窗体的托管的代码开发人员必须使用中的 Api命名空间。Managed code developers using Windows Forms must use the APIs in the namespace.
